name: Qunomedical GmbH
description: Developer of a digital medical platform intended to connect patients with the doctors easily. The company's platform allows users to search for desired treatment and browse through the hospitals offering the procedure by country, enabling patients to get full information about procedures, doctors, hospitals, pricing, and destinations.
